thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 49 of 2268
thread.title: Alicia Hempton

author: Alicia Hempton
title: Alicia Hempton
text: The process was easy. Instructions for measuring were clear and helpful.The blinds arrived in good condition and looking as I had expected them to look. More importantly, they were exactly the right size for the windows. Relatively easy to fit, they are good quality and enhance all of the windows; allowing a good combination of privacy and light into the rooms. One point for improvement: one of the blinds has a long drop and should really be fitted with a longer chord to enable easy movement up and down. Apart from one family member who is 6ft4in, we have to stand on the window cill to raise or lower it - not ideal.
